# Quotations {#quotes}



## Introduction

There are many good quotations about data, statistics, and data science—this is a short collection of ones that struck me as pithy, containing nuggets of wisdom.


## Science (general)


“One may study and observe and know a great many facts but when it comes to the how and the why, one finds one has little knowledge and a great deal of wonderment.” 
—Grace O. Wiley [@Wiley_1937]
